title: Alliance with the Vargaldi
tagline: in which the Dunmar Fellowship forges a new alliance
summary: The Dunmar Fellowship arrives at Isenborg and presents gifts to King Brimskarda.
A feast with Brimskarda reveals Frost Giant history and the party gains intelligence on the Vargaldi.
Algerd, a historian, joins the fellowship in search of his sister and knowledge.
The party battles and defeats an ice worm, rescuing two shape-shifting Vargaldi.
The victory leads to an alliance with the Vargaldi, who reveal their hidden village.
short_summary: The Dunmar Fellowship forges an alliance with the shape-shifting Vargaldi after a battle with an ice worm and initial diplomacy at Isenborg.
location: Isenborg and the Ket river valley
